result.markdown:
---
title: "Election in Class Exercise"
editor: visual
---




Data available here: <https://historical.elections.virginia.gov/elections/view/144567/>

*AK COMMENT: The reason it wasn't recognizing the joined_vacomparison name below is that you haven't actually imported the data into the script? In other words, you brought the files in to the project - so that's good. But you then also need to tell the R script that the file exists and to import the data in to it.*
*Like this:*


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
joined_vacomparison <- readRDS("joined_vacomparison.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
joined_vacomparison%>%
mutate(mc_overperform = pct_mcauliffe - biden_pct, mc_overperform_worsethan10 = if_else(mc_overperform < -10, "YES", "NO"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
joined_vacomparison%>%
mutate(mc_overperform = biden_pct - pct_mcauliffe, mc_overperform_worsethan15 = if_else(mc_overperform < -15, "YES", "NO"))
```
